name: Elan Technologies
tag_list: php, iphone, android, ipad, seo, asp-net, software, development, offshore, outsourcing, blackberry, mobile, app, asp-net-development, php-development
overview:
Overview Elan Technologies is an ISO 9001:2008 certified company headquartered in India. We’re one of the top firms and a trusted provider since 2005 with more then 35% revenue in repeat earnings.

Our Key Differentiators are: ————————————–

  • 100% customer acceptance achieved otherwise money back guaranteed.

  • Direct access to our leadership team.

  • Exceptional focus on safeguarding client’s interest & strong adherence to public non disclosure (NDA).

  • 30 to 90 days free warranty, 100% covered.

Our Key Strength Areas are: ————————————–

  • Open Source Technologies (PHP, RoR, MySQL)

  • Microsoft Technologies (ASP.NET, C#, MS SQL)

  • Mobile Technologies (iPhone, Android, Blackberry, WM)

  • Search Engine Optimization

Service Description Overview ————-

Elan is a global IT services and Consulting firm headquartered in India, founded in 2005 by inspired team of entrepreneurs having more than 20+ years experience in IT Services & Consulting.

With 3 offshore development centers & strong team of 125+ associates we combine breadth and depth of capabilities to deliver on the most challenging client needs. Our team works together with clients to create complete end-to-end solutions that are compelling, dynamic & add value to client’s business.
